title: Breaking the 120g Barrier: How Pushing the Potential of the ‘Carbohydrate Revolution’ Could Reshape Pro Cycling
content:
Experts believe the 'carb ceiling' is there to be shattered - the performance impact could be bonkers: '120 is a reference, but the exact number is far higher.'

Read the full article at Breaking the 120g Barrier: How Pushing the Potential of the ‘Carbohydrate Revolution’ Could Reshape Pro Cycling on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
